backend/main.mo: Defines actor with product, order, wallet, user, and authorization types, state maps, comparators, and admin‑protected product management functions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured feature evidence records mapping requested features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base variables and theme definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, wraps app in AppShell and ThemeProvider, and protects routes with AuthGate/AdminGate.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access denied card with warning icon and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Checks user role and identity, showing admin content, claim-access screen, or access‑denied accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Redirects unauthenticated users to login and displays a loader during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/ClaimAdminA: Login form for claiming admin access using username and password with mutation handling and error display.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Displays a product card with icon, name, price, and optional auto‑delivery badge.
App layout wrapper with header, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer showing social links, app download badge, support info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Navigation header with logo, links, auth handling, and user/admin dropdown menus.
frontend/src/components/promo/InstallApp: Bottom install prompt bar shown until dismissed using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous actor instance and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin hooks for fetching, approving, and rejecting wallet top‑up transactions with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/clear functions, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching caller orders, creating orders, and fetching all orders with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, products, roles, and admin access through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit wallet top‑up transactions and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Hooks for fetching the caller's wallet balance and wallet top‑up transactions using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS base styles, theme variables, and custom utility classes for a purple‑accent UI theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that mounts React, sets up QueryClientProvider, and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AddMoneyPage.tsx: UI for submitting wallet top‑ups, displaying balance, listing transactions, and handling form submission.
Admin interface showing transactions, orders, and users with actions to approve or reject transactions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUsPage.tsx: Static contact page showing Telegram and email support details.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing balance, transactions, orders, and a profile setup dialog if profile is missing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, promotional offers, and product listings fetched via useGetProducts.
frontend/src/pages/IdCodeTopUpPage.tsx: UI page for selecting diamond packages and entering a Free Fire UID, showing payment instructions once UID is provided.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with disabled email/password fields and auto-redirect on successful auth.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration page with disabled input fields that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/TopupPage.tsx: Displays a list of top-up products and handles navigation or order creation depending on authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended animations, shadows, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing Add Money page UI updates, instructions, required icons, and existing feature requirements.
